title: [Large-Scale] Program to Enhance Mathematical Concept Understanding Through Indirect Failure Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic computation skills and elementary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: A mathematics concept pedagogy training course for pre-service teachers, featuring real-time interactive classes centered on formative assessment in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain relationships between concepts by analyzing various error cases in mathematical problem-solving processes.
Learners can reconstruct optimal problem-solving procedures with over 80% accuracy based on observed failure cases.
Learners can design teaching strategies that apply concepts acquired through indirect failure-based learning to real classroom situations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
